tools: any one type of {@item artisan's tools|PHB}

default: a gadget of choice and blueprints

a: a gadget of your choices and blueprints

classFeature.name: Creation Power (Spellcasting)
entries: You gain the ability to prepare and cast Tinkerer creation powers (spells). See the Tinkerer table for spell slots and Natural Abilities (cantrips) known.
Gadget & Blueprints: At 1st level, you have a gadget and blueprints containing six 1st-level Tinkerer spells of your choice. Your gadget is a power source and acts as a spellcasting focus.
Preparing Spells: You prepare a number of spells equal to your Intelligence modifier + your Tinkerer level (minimum 1).
Spellcasting ability: Intelligence. Creation save DC = 8 + proficiency bonus + INT modifier. Creation attack modifier = proficiency bonus + INT modifier.

classFeature.name: Recharging
entries: Once per day when you finish a short rest, you can choose expended spell slots to recover. The combined level of the slots you recover can be equal to or less than half your Tinkerer level (rounded up). None of the returned slots can be 6th level or higher.

classFeature.name: Tinkerer Study
entries: At 2nd level you choose a Tinkerer Study: Military Science, Meteorology, or Robotics. Your choice gives features at 2nd level and again at 6th, 10th, and 14th level.

classFeature.name: Adaptive Cantrip Technology
entries: Whenever you finish a long rest, you can replace one Tinkerer cantrip you know with another cantrip from the Tinkerer spell list.

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: At levels 4, 8, 12, 16, and 19 you can increase ability scores as usual, or take a feat if your DM allows.

classFeature.name: Master of Innovation
entries: Choose one 1st-level Tinkerer spell and one 2nd-level Tinkerer spell from your Blueprints. While you have them prepared, you can cast each at its lowest level at will without expending slots. To change your choices, study for 8 hours to replace one or both with spells of the same levels.

classFeature.name: Ultimate Technology
entries: Choose two 3rd-level Tinkerer spells in your Blueprints as signature creation powers. You always have these prepared and can cast each once at 3rd level without expending a slot. You regain uses after a short or long rest.

classFeature.name: Tinkerer Study feature
entries: At 6th level, you gain an additional feature from your chosen Tinkerer Study.

classFeature.name: Tinkerer Study feature
entries: At 10th level, you gain an additional feature from your chosen Tinkerer Study.

fluff.name: Military Science
entries: Those who study military science apply their tinkering to warfare, improving offensive and defensive capabilities.

fluff.name: Meteorology
entries: Meteorology tinkerers manipulate weather and storms with their technology.

fluff.name: Robotics
entries: Robotics tinkerers craft automatons, constructs, and robots to assist them.

subclassFeature.name: Deflector Shield
entries: When you are hit by an attack or fail a saving throw, you can use your reaction to gain +2 to AC against that attack or +4 to that saving throw. When you use this feature, you cannot cast spells other than cantrips until the end of your next turn.

subclassFeature.name: Tactical Mind
entries: You gain a bonus to initiative equal to your Intelligence modifier.

subclassFeature.name: Power Surge
entries: You can store Power Surges equal to your Intelligence modifier (minimum 1). After a long rest your Power Surges reset to 1. When you successfully end a spell with Dispel Magic or Counterspell, you gain one Power Surge. Spend a Power Surge to add force damage equal to your Tinkerer level to a damaging Tinkerer spell (once per turn).

subclassFeature.name: Durable Tech
entries: While concentrating on a spell, you gain +2 to AC and +2 to all saving throws.

subclassFeature.name: Deflecting Shroud
entries: At 14th level, your Deflector Shield becomes infused with deadly energy. When you use your Deflector Shield feature, you can cause power to arc from you. Up to three creatures of your choice that you can see within 60 feet of you each take force damage equal to half your Tinkerer level.

subclassFeature.name: Cloud Surfing
entries: As a bonus action immediately before or after you cast a 1st-level or higher Tinkerer spell, create a floating cloud beneath you and fly up to 10 feet without provoking opportunity attacks.

subclassFeature.name: Storm Forecasting
entries: While holding your gadget, you have resistance to lightning and thunder. When you start casting a Tinkerer spell of 1st level or higher that deals lightning or thunder, you may cause creatures of your choice within 10 feet to take lightning or thunder damage equal to half your Tinkerer level.

subclassFeature.name: Weather Control
entries: You can use an action to change weather effects in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on you (detailed in the class text). You can use this effect a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus per long rest; you may expend a spell slot to use it again.

subclassFeature.name: Thunder Counter
entries: When hit by a melee attack, use your reaction to deal thunder damage equal to your Tinkerer level to the attacker. The attacker must make a Strength save vs your Creation save DC or be pushed up to 20 feet in a straight line.

subclassFeature.name: Storm Immunity
entries: While holding your gadget, you are immune to lightning and thunder damage.

subclassFeature.name: Machine Summoning
entries: When you summon a creature with a Conjuration Tinkerer spell, it appears as a construct and counts as a Construct. The cost/time to copy a Conjuration spell into your Blueprints is halved.

subclassFeature.name: Simple Robots
entries: As an action you can craft a tiny or small robot that functions within 30 feet of you; AC = 8 + INT modifier, HP = 1, speed 30 ft (pick walk/swim/fly). The robot lasts 1 hour unless maintained; it is destroyed on taking damage or if you create another.

subclassFeature.name: Quantum Teleportation
entries: As an action you can teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see, or swap places with a robot/construct you created within range. Recharge: long rest or casting a Conjuration Tinkerer spell of 1st level or higher.

subclassFeature.name: Autopilot Controls
entries: While you are concentrating on a Conjuration spell, your concentration cannot be broken as a result of taking damage.

subclassFeature.name: Reinforced Exterior
entries: Creatures you summon or create with a Conjuration Tinkerer spell gain 30 temporary hit points.
